Properties.Property: Select [ContractorID],[ContractorCompany],[ContractorLastname],[ContractorFirstname],[ContractorEmail],[ContractorPhoneNumber],[ContractorContractNumber],[ContractorLocationCode] From dbo.[Contractors] where([ContractorContractNumber] LIKE @ContractNumber) and ([ContractorFirstname] LIKE @FirstName) and ([ContractorLastname] LIKE @LastName) and ([ContractorCompany] LIKE @Company)

Select [EmployeeID],[EmployeeLastname],[EmployeeFirstname],[EmployeeEmail],[EmployeeInternalPhoneNumber],[EmployeeExternalPhoneNumber],[EmployeeMobilePhoneNumber],[EmployeeLocation],[EmployeeLocationCode],[EmployeeCompany] From dbo.[Employees] where([EmployeeCompany] LIKE @Company) and ([EmployeeLocation] LIKE @Location) and ([EmployeeFirstname] LIKE @FirstName) and ([EmployeeLastname] LIKE @LastName)

Select [ProjectOfficeID],[ProjectOfficeName],[ProjectOfficeContact],[ProjectOfficePhoneNumber],[ProjectOfficeFaxNumber],[ProjectOfficeEmail],[ProjectOfficeAddress],[ProjectOfficeCountry] From dbo.[ProjectOffices] where([ProjectOfficeCountry] LIKE @Country) and ([ProjectOfficeContact] LIKE @Contact) and ([ProjectOfficeName] LIKE @Name)
